about.sendFeedbackDetail: You can send your valuable feedback to Telegram channel or send mail directly.

moreApps.apps1Desc: `OHM-Client` is an unofficial open hardware monitor client app for android and iOS written in react-native. Using this app you can monitor open hardware monitor web server.
moreApps.apps2Desc: This application allows you to enable/disable ads or recommendations for various apps in Xiaomi (MIUI) devices.

settings.librariesSubTitle: List of open source libraries used in this project
settings.translateSubTitle: Translate this app in your language
settings.translatorsSubTitle: People who helped localize this app

appearanceSettings.title: Appearance
appearanceSettings.accentColorSubTitle: Color used to tint UI elements

aboutScreen.title: About OHMClient
aboutScreen.infoDescTitle: `OHM-Client` is an unofficial open hardware monitor client app for android and iOS written in react-native. Using this app you can monitor open hardware monitor web server.
aboutScreen.telegramSubTitle: Discussion about bugs, improvements, feature request and development news
aboutScreen.githubSubTitle: Developer profile and list of open sourced projects

row2.dialogSubTitle: Port number of Open Hardware Monitor client

row3.title: Refresh Interval (in millisecond)

row3.dialogSubTitle: The dashboard data will refresh at specific interval.

row1.title: Set Authentication
row1.subTitle: Enable HTTP Basic Authentication ie username and password.
row1.dialogSubTitle: If you have changed authentication, please restart your windows client app.

row1.title: Scan Timeout
row1.subTitle: {{scanTimeoutInMs}} ms
row1.dialogSubTitle: Scan timeout per threads, ex: 150 threads per 1500 ms, If device not found try to increase timeout.

row2.title: Scan Threads
row2.subTitle: {{scanThreads}}
row2.dialogSubTitle: Scan threads per timeouts,  ex: 150 threads per 1500 ms, If device not found try to decrease threads.
